[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1571477632007{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”ABOUT OTAE” font_container=”tag:p|font_size:20px|text_align:left|color:%23000000″ use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]We are the fastest growing EPC (Engineering Procurement & Construction) Company in Bangladesh. Our business step originates from our core values of Integrity, Fairness, Accountability, and Social Responsibility. These ethical sources determine our goals and vision to serve our large customer base and the world at large. Our Business group has successfully diversified product and service portfolios in different sectors through different business units during the last one decade. All our achievements would surely speak about our phenomenal success story.
The Optimal Track Automation & Engineering is a pure Technical Consultancy, Design, Engineering, and Construction company in Bangladesh, which has significant exposure country’s ever-emerging Industrial Sector in Bangladesh.
At the moment we have associated ourselves in the emerging market of Bangladesh with full expertise in the area of energy and Power, Oil, Gas, and Industrial utility management systems. Process Automation and building Electrical Substations, Substation automation System (SAS), central SCADA System within House IT & Software development. We are dedicated to providing the best possible support to our esteemed and world-class eminent customers. We have successfully performed a number of projects and related works for our esteemed and eminent customers.
The OTAE has several partners and principals to cover all support in the field of technology like for Power and Energy market our technology partner is EKOSinerji and METROELEKTRIK and for SCADA and SAS.OTAE is technology partner of IDS GmbH and Datawatt Netherlands as well as channel partner of ETAP-USA(OTI) for system Study & System Simulation of industries and power sector.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_single_image image=”2715″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1453212299071{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”EXPERIENCED TEAM” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”title”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1453297105826{margin-bottom: 45px !important;}”][vc_column]

Wais Mahmood

 Chief Advisor & Strategist
